document.full_text: the nation's hardest-hit economy, las vegas, is finally showing signs of life because of an increase in tourism, according to a key barometer of economic activity released on monday.
document.title: las vegas, nation's worst hit economy, begins rebound
lines_and_colors: the nation's hardest-hit economy, las vegas, is finally showing signs of life because of an increase in tourism, according to a key barometer of economic activity released on monday.
